title: Staking
body:
I propose we develop staking of our coin and or coins in our Dao.

This feature will entice holders to hold and re-invest into the project.

Staking coins will provide investors with an apr % of the pool.

Daily investor
(for small network fee)
will be able to stake their
(solar or SlmV2) coins for a small network fee,

Then claim rewarded coin
(solar or SlmV2) for a small network fee daily.

If left staked,
Rewards continue to compile until claimed
(for small network fee).

Feature Request

Submmited By:

0xCA6886946b7A93b987682148FEfcf416DC5F6F86
author: 0x6D2FF65B04f47aF0b3d784a425CFD000dbF3baa4
